description: Paula Carb¨® Zea knew a proposal might be imminent, but did not expect this.
title: Train driver accepts platform marriage proposal
title_page: Train driver accepts platform marriage proposal - BBC News
maintext: The Irish Rail spokesman added that Ms Carb¨® Zea and her colleagues had been "working throughout the year to ensure we continue to provide our essential services to those who must travel, and we thank them for all they have done, and for this amazing moment".
